K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:14b-1: tree lo kya bi dza ya mah'a ka wa r'a dz'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:14b-3: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:14b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:14b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:14b-6: bcom ldan 'das ri rab ri'i rtse mo na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:14b-7: nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:14b-8: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-4: bltar mi rung ba du ma sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-7: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-9: bdag gis lha chen po la sogs pa sems can ma rungs pa de dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-11: de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-12: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-13: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas gsan nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad cas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-18: ji ltar khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15a-21: bdag sems can ma lus pa 'dul bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-0: @15b bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde ba can rnams dbang du bgyi ba la sogs pas btul nas bla na med pa'i bde ba la bgod par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-1: sems can ma rungs pa rnams bsad pa la sogs pas sbyangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-2: zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-7: 'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-9: bde ba'i phyir snying po 'di smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-10: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas lha thams cad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-11: mi rnams thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-13: sangs rgyas la skyabs su dongs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-14: nga'i bka' yang rjes su skyongs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag btsal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-16: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-18: grihn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-19: a'a na ya ho bha g b'a na badzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-20: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum thams cad g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:15b-22: kun tu rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-0: de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams @16a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-1: cad 'dar yed yed nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-3: khor khor yug chen po'i ri la sogs pa tshun chad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyis gang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas 'di skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-6: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabs su 'gro bar khas long zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-7: nga'i bka' yang rjes su skyongs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-8: de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes skrag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-9: 'dar yed yed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-12: tshangs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-14: 'di lta bu'i sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-15: 'di ltar byin che zhing bdag cag 'chos pa 'di su lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di glengs te gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-17: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16a-19: kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-0: sangs rgyas thams @16b cad nyid skyes 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-1: phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-2: ma rungs 'chos la dbang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-3: gang ming brjod pa des yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-4: sangs rgyas pa yang thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-5: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-7: sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong la nga'i bka' bzhin du yang gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-8: rdo rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur ba 'dis khyed thams cad gtan sreg par gyur ta re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-9: de nas lha chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-10: khyod ni gnod sbyin nged ni lha bas na nged kyis gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjes su skyong bar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-11: de nas phyag na rdo rjes de thos nas khros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-12: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-14: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar dbang bskur te bskos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-15: de bas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal na lha chen po 'di 'dul bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:16b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-1: bka' bzhin du byed pa bdag cag ma lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-2: de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-3: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-5: nga ni thams cad kyi dbang po chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-8: skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-11: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po khros nas 'di skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-12: khyod ni lus srul po mi sha za ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-14: drag shul gyi las byed pas na gtum po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-15: sha za'i lus srel ba na ji ltar tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-18: tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-19: gtogs 'dod ces bya ba ni thar pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-20: dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-21: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po de ni nga yin pas 'dul nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-22: de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khros nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-23: 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gad mos bgad nas 'jigs pa chen por byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17a-25: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtha' med par gzugs sna tshogs su byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-7: mi mtshungs pa'i mtshon cha 'debs shing gtong ba ma mo rnams kyi tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-8: 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas par kun bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-12: mu med pa'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-13: khro bo rab tu mi bzad pa ma rungs pa'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu rab tu 'thab cing shin tu 'gyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-14: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan mo'i mun nag tu byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-15: 'bar ba chen po'i phung pos klongs te rab tu snang bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba chen po cung zad du mche ba'i thog ma gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-17: smin ma'i mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-18: mig g-yon pa cher bgrad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-19: rdo rje'i lta ba khro ba dang bcas pas zab mo'i tshig gis snying po mchog 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-21: h'um/ de nas h'um zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun sgra des gang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-24: kun tu rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:17b-28: de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-2: bskyab tu gsol zhes nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-4: gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra ba ni khyod rab tu mi bgrungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-5: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-6: yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-7: aom sumbha ni su mbha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-9: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-10: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'na badzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-11: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lha'i bdag po thams cad 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gang na ba der mgo rkang bzlos ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-12: ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas brlams par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-13: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs g-yon pas mnan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-15: phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'di 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar byed pa legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18a-16: de bas na thul la dbugs phyungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-0: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi phyir rdo rjes bcings pa @18b 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-1: aom badzra di dho me bha ba raksha sarba n'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-2: de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa de dag dran pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-5: sems can chen po 'di'i bka' bzhin du byed par khas long zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshal lo zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-7: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-9: de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-10: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag byas nas mchi ma blags te ngo ro bton nas skyabs su dong ste; bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-11: nga bdag cag khyod kyi bka' nyan na ci ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-12: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de rnams la gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-15: sdom pa gzung bar khas longs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:18b-18: bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing byang chub tu 'ang sems bskyed par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-0: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems @19a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-1: dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du btsud nas sdom pa 'dzin du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-2: byang chub sems ni brtan byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-3: sems can thams cad bde ba stsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-4: phyag na rdo rje bdag chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-6: 'di ni gsang ba pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas dam tshig byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-8: aom badzra sa ma ya aa bhi shinytsa m'a bi r'a ga ye sarba k'a m'an h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-9: de nas de dag gis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-10: 'di ni bdud kyis smras pas na bdag cag mi nyan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyed cag gis 'di la ma brnyas shig ces gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-12: de dag gis gsol ba ji ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-15: nga ni ji ltar 'dul bzhin du byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-16: 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun 'byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-17: ji ltar bde ba la mi chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19a-18: sdug bsngal la 'dod chags pa can ji lta bus 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-0: de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin @19b gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpas ci nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-1: de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-2: aom badrza sa ma ya aa bhi shinytsa mi bi r'a ga ya sarba k'a m'am h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-3: de nas de dag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba bzhin no zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-4: de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes lag tu rdo rje byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-5: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba 'di byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-6: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dha ro ttve badzra p'a ni h'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-8: de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-9: dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rig sngags mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-10: mthu bo che ni rdo rje sgyu ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-11: tshangs pa ni rdo rje mi smra ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-12: sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-13: dbang po ni rdo rje 'thab cha ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-14: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po thams cad rig pa'i blon po chen por dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-15: de nas bar snang la rgyu ba rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-19: zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-20: be con rtse mo ni rdo rje be con no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-21: skya sleng ni rdo rje skya sleng ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-22: de rnams ni rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-23: de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-24: chang gis myos pa ni rdo rjes zin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:19b-25: chang byed ni rdo rje phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-2: rgyal ba skyes pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-3: de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-4: de nas sa pa rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-6: mdzod skyong ni rdo rje gru shing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-7: rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-9: ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-10: de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-11: de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i dbang po thams cad rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-13: phag ni rdo rje kyo ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-14: gshin rje ni rdo rje nag po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-15: sa'i spyi bo ni rdo rje rnam 'dren no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-16: b'a ru na ni rdo rje klu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-17: de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran du dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-18: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis lha mo thams cad kyi lag tu rdo rje byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-20: rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-22: nyon mongs pa ni rdo rje khro ba ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-23: nor can ni rdo rje gser ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-24: tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-25: dug mo ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-26: dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-27: de dag la sogs pa ni rigs sngags kyi blon mo chen mor dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-28: de nas bar snang la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-30: bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-31: 'khrung ma ni rdo rje sdug gu ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20a-32: be con 'chang ma ni rdo rje be con rtse ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-0: skye @20b 'phrog ma ni rdo rje rked chings ma ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-1: de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro mor dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-2: de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-4: gsod ma ni rdo rje gsod ma ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-5: za ba mo ni rdo rje zab mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-6: gos ni rdo rje bgo ba mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-7: dga' mo ni rdo rje dbang mo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-8: de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje tshogs ma mor dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-9: de nas sa la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-11: zhi ba mo ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-12: rlung ma ni rdo rje mgyogs ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-14: ku be ra ma ni rdo rje thag gu ma ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-15: de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bskur ba byin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-17: phag mo ni rdo rje gdong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-18: mgo lpags ma ni rdo rje nag mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-19: sna chad ma ni rdo rje phyags ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-20: klu mo ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-21: de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-22: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos btsud pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje'i dam tshig byin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-23: aom pa li tod pa li tod badzra a'a ka rsha ya h'um dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-25: aom badzra aa gri pi t'a ya sa ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-26: bar snang la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-27: aom badzra m'a l'a gra lam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-30: sa la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:20b-31: aom badzra p'a t'a la bhanydza bhanydza h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-0: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma @21a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-1: ya sarba du shtam sa ma ya mu bra bha ndha tsakra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-2: ma mo rnams thams cad kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag btsal nas 'di skad gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-5: bdag ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-7: ma rungs ba'i sems can gyis dkyil 'khor de dag la ji ltar bgyi pa bka' stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-9: gang gis sems can de rnams sems can thams cad la phan pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid la tshud cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-10: de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-12: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon 'di dag la ji ltar nan tan bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-13: rims la sogs pa ji ltar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-14: dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi rnams ji ltar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-16: dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du tshud cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-17: de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-19: mi 'di rnams ji ltar nan tan bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du tshud cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-0: rdo rje'i @21b dkyil 'khor du btsud nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du tshud cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-1: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du btsud nas las kyi dkyil 'khor du btsud cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-2: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-4: tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-5: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-7: grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-8: dkyil 'khor chen por bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-9: de nas yang dag rab bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-10: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-12: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-13: de la srad bu bre ba'i cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-15: gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-16: tshad ma bzang po'i srad pu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-17: shes rab can gyis srad bre ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-18: 'jig rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-19: de ya dbus su gdab pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-20: seng ldeng phur pa brtan par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-21: de las srad bu bre gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-22: srad bu nyis lnga pa kyis byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-23: bcu drug cha ru bgo bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-24: thams cad du ni rim gsum mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-25: khor khor yug rigs dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-26: phur bu yis ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-27: de yi nang du bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-28: srad bu rim bdun ldan par te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-29: tshon ser dri zhim ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-30: thig rnams kyang ni gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-31: de yi dbus su gzhag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:21b-32: shin tu bkrabs pa'i nas phul bzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-2: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-3: sangs rgyas thad 'khor thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-4: byang chub brgyad ni rim bzhin par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-5: bri 'am yang na gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-6: tshon sna lnga mchog rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-7: sangs rgyas spyan snga de ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-8: phyag na rdo rje de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-9: bri'am gzhag par bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-10: rdo rje h'um zhes par 'dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-11: de yi zhabs ni g-yon pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-12: dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-13: g-yas pa'i zhabs kyis btsir ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-14: nyon mongs ma yin lha mo 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-15: 'dod grub spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-16: srad bu rim bdun par dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-17: bri 'am yang na gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-18: rdo rje shugs kyis dgongs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-19: phyi rol byung nas de ru yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-20: gling rnams bzhi yang bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-21: dbyibs dang cho ga ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-22: grva yi ri mo legs par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-23: gling rnams dbus ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-24: 'jig rten ji bzhin bsogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-25: tshangs pa la sogs bzhi yi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-26: de ru 'jig rten dbang po bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-27: khor khor yug ri dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-28: gling rnams kyi yang bar dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-29: phyi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-30: dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-31: sgo srung bri bar bya ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-32: rdo rje sgo bzhi de dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-33: rdo rje kyo ba zhags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-34: sgrog dang dril bu de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-35: kho ra khor yug ri yi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22a-36: phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-0: gnam dal @22b dang ni nad dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-1: mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon drag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-2: bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-3: chos min can ni gzhig phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-4: de yi phyi rol du dgod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-5: gtor ma sna tshogs mchog rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-7: de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'jug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-8: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-9: ser la thag gu dmar po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-10: de'i steng du dri zhim po'i me tog bzhag nas snying po 'di brjod la zhugs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-11: aom bdzra pra t'i tsa ma ha ha ha ha hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-12: de nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas du ru ka'i bdug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-14: rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis kyo btang du byas la snying po 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-15: aom au ru gra gra bi ri ni bi ri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-18: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na de las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni ba spu g-yo ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-22: de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor me tog gtor cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-23: de nas slob ma gzhug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-24: de la thog ma nyid du bkrus nas slob ma gos gtsang ma bskon te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-25: gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:22b-26: bslab pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa la so sor gnas par byas nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-1: nas gdong ras kyis g-yog nas mgo gtsug tor du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-2: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-3: bcug nas me tog gtor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-4: de nas gang la 'bab pa de ni de'i lha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-5: de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas rang gi rig pa'i lha ston la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-6: de la mchod cing slob dpon la yang ci 'dod pa'i yon phul nas de rang gi rig pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-7: sngags bzlas te phyag rgya yang bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-8: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-9: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-10: de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-11: rdo rje'i phreng ba mnyam ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-12: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-13: 'jug par bya ba de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-14: las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-15: dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-16: de bzhin rdo rje gsor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-17: 'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-18: rdo rje mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-19: de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje bzung la ji srid du 'gul pa de srid bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-20: de phyin cad rdo rje des las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-22: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23a-23: dkyil 'khor chen po kun bris nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-0: mtshan ma thams cad bstan par @23b bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-1: 'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-2: rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-3: de la rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-4: rdo rje 'dzin ma kun byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-5: rdo rje kun tu brtag bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-6: g-yas par gzhag nas g-yon pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-7: dril bu gsil nas 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-8: btsud nas su ni dril bu de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-9: mnyam par gzhag pas gsil bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-10: slob dpon gyur cig dam tshig kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-11: rtag tu bsrungs zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-12: ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-13: de yi mi rtag pa ru gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-14: de ltar khyod la byin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-15: rdo rje chen po zhes bya 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-16: nges par sreg par 'gyur ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-17: de ste rdo rje 'dzin dad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-18: skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-19: ji ltar byang chub sems 'dod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-20: khyod kyis de tshe spangs gyur na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-21: de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-22: aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-23: de nas de bzhin du 'dug la de nas rdo rje'i chu 'di blud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-24: de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas cho ga bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-26: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-27: de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-28: cha lugs mang po gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-29: btsud nas las rnams thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-30: slob dpon gyis ni de bzhin bslab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:23b-31: de nas las kyi rab tu sbyor ba 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab ga bzhir byas la mngar po'i yam shing la me bus la mngar po'i @24a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-2: 'bras bu rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar las sbags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-3: bla gos g-yas su gzar la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-4: rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-7: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i las rnams la lag pa g-yon pas bdag gis phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-8: g-yas pas bsregs na de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu thab zur gsum du kha ba'i tsher ma rnon po'i yam shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-14: 'bras bu'ang de dang 'dra bar rang gi khrag gis bskus nas stan mkhrang po la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-15: bla gos g-yon du gzar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-16: khros pa'i tshig gis bzlas shing g-yon pas bsregs na dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-24: stan 'pho ba la sogs pa las drag po rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-26: dam tshig gi bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-27: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams cad kyi las ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas su rtsva 'jam po bting ba la 'dug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24a-28: stod g-yogs sbyar ma ltar bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-0: ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas shing 'khor lo lta bu'i @24b thab tu du ba med pa'i mdag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras g-yas g-yon gyis sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon du rdo rje lta bu'i thab byas la stod g-yogs kyis yan lag thams cad bcings te rlod stan 'jam po la 'dug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-2: yam shing thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'jings [?] pa'i me la lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pas gzar bu gzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-3: rdo rje tshig gis zlos shing ro thams cad bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-7: dbang du byas pa la sogs pa dam pa 'grub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-8: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgya la ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-9: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-10: de nas yo byad bshad par bya'o zhes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad mthong bar 'gyur nas sgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-13: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-14: dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-15: phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-16: gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-18: chags dang rdo rje de nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-19: de la chags par ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:24b-20: phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-2: dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-3: yang dag ma mthong grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-4: the tshom can gyis mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-5: rab tu 'jigs pa rnyed nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-6: nad kyis kyang ni 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-7: gdon yang de la brtson par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-8: shi nas ngu 'bod du ltung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-9: de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad du chug la nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-10: gdon la sogs pa ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog ras la bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-12: de'i thad 'khor kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-14: g-yas phyogs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-16: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-17: g-yon phyogs su ni rdo rje khu tshur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-20: steng du nam mkha'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-22: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyis bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-23: lag pa gnyis po gzhan la g-yas pa ni rdo rje gsor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-24: g-yon pas ni me tog gi gzhu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-26: sku mdog ni autpal sngon po lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-27: yid tsam 'dzum la mche ba cung zad gtsigs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-28: khro ba dang bcas pas bzhad pa'i zhal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-29: phyir brkyang bsku ma du gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25a-30: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-0: zhabs g-yon @25b bas lha chen po'i 'dan pa g-yon par mnan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-1: zhabs g-yas pa bskum pas au ma'i nu mar btsir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-2: stod g-yog khra bos yan lag g-yogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-3: ko rlon gyi smad g-yogs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgyan du thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-5: de nas tshes zhag gcig nas mgo brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-8: lo'i par du nyin re zhing brgya stong bzlas te gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te bdag gi khyim du gnas shing zas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos te bzlas na de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-9: zla ba dang pos ni h'um zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-10: gnyis kyis ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-11: gsum gyis ni bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-12: ma 'ongs pa thams cad ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-13: bzhis ni sems can thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-14: dbang du bya par nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-15: zla ba lngas ni yid bzhin snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-17: zla ba drug gis ni ci 'dod pa thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-18: zla ba bdun gyis ni bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-20: phyag na rdo rjer ston cing cho 'phrul thams cad kyang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:25b-21: zla ba brgyad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-2: zla ba dgus ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-6: zla ba bcus ni sa bcu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-7: zla ba bcu gcig gis ni bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-8: zla ba bcu gnyis pas ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-9: de nas sgrub pa bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-10: ras la rdo rje h'um zhes pa de bzhin du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-11: de'i thad 'khor thams cad du mthu chen po la sogs pa nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-12: klu b'a ru na'i mtha'i bar du bcom ldan 'das la sgong zhing pus mo gtsugs pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-13: de nas de bzhin du bzlas pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya grangs med par bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-15: tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan thal byung bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-17: 'ongs nas kyang dbang du 'gyur te thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-18: de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-19: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris nas gser gyi mdangs kyi lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgya bsgreng nas gar byed cing mi sdug pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs su bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-20: de nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gi mtha'i mtshan thal byung du zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-21: de nas nang par kun lhags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26a-22: de bzhin du gar dag gis sgrub pa po la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-0: @26b 'di la rtog pa 'dir bris pa de bzhin no snyam du bsams nas des mi 'jigs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-2: rtag tu las thams cad byed pa'i g-yog mor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-3: de nas cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-4: de nas de bzhin du brgyad stong du bzlas na nub tha ma la rdo rje 'dzin pa 'thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-5: ci 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog kyang 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-6: gzhan yang sgrub pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-7: de nas dgos pa kun bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-8: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar ci 'dod par yam shing thams cad kyis sbyin sreg gis lo gcig gi bar du bsregs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-9: de nas rdo rje h'um zhes pa bris pa de'i spyan sngar lo gcig gi mtha'i bar du grangs med par zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-10: de nas tha mar bcom ldan 'das rang gi ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa 'gul gyi bar du zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-13: de nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-14: grub pa des na dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:26b-20: stan 'pho ba la sogs pa las phran tshegs kyi bcings pas h'um zhes pas mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-1: gzhan te rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-3: 'jim pa las phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs byas la phyag gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dzin to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-4: de zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-5: tshes bco lnga'i bar du mar bzhi bre brgyad kyis khrus shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-6: de nas tha mar mtshan thal byung bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-7: de nas nad par gzugs de bzhad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-8: de nas rig pa thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-9: de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cha lugs bri'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-11: 'jig pa la de bzhin du phyag brkyang ba rdo rje 'dzin par byas la de'i zhabs kyi bar du spos chus bkrus na de phyin chad yid bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-12: de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-15: g-yas par rdo rje h'um zhes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-18: de nas de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum smyung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-20: de'i nang bar de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-21: bskal par gnas shing mi dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-22: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27a-24: de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-0: dkyil 'khor @27b mthong bas lci ba gsum gyis khrus byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-1: dus gsum du gos brjes la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-2: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas brgyad stong dus gsum du nyin bdun bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-3: de nas phyag na rdo rjes slob dpon gyi gzugs su byas nas rmi lam du thams cad smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-5: dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bas zla ba gcig gi bar du de bzhin du dus gsum du khrus byas nas dus gsum du gos brjes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-6: dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-7: rno lcags kyi mtshon chas der rdo rje bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-8: de la lta zhing rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-9: brgyad brgya bzlas na zla ba gcig gi mthar bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-10: de nas rdo rje sgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-13: shing leb la bris nas de la mchod pa byas te rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-14: lo gcig tshun chad rdo rje nam 'bar gyi bar du zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-15: 'bar ba des na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-16: lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-19: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-21: yid ba de ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-22: tshe yang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:27b-23: de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-0: rdo rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na rig @28a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-1: 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-2: de nas 'khor lo sgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-3: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la lcags kyi 'khor lo thogs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-4: nam rdo rjer gyur cing slar yang 'khor lor gyur gyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-5: de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-6: de nas kyo ba tang bsgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser gyi kyo ba tang bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-7: lag pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-8: grub pa rnam gsum du gyur gyi bar du bzlas la dros pa tsam gyis thams cad kun dgug nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-9: dud pa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-10: 'bar bas ni thams cad dgug nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-11: dbang du bya nus shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-12: de nas lha la sogs pa thams cad dgu pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-13: lha chen po la sogs pa lha rnams gang yang rung ba'i cha lugs rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-14: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-15: bsdigs shing zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar du bzlas na lha thams cad lhags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28a-16: las thams cad byed pa'i g-yog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-0: klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na klu'i mtshor lte ba man chad chu'i nang du bcug la lo gcig tshun chad klu thams cad rang gi gzugs su ston @28b cing las thams cad byed pa'i g-yog tu gyur gyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-1: gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod pas gnod sbyin gang la gnas pa'i gnas der rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la gnod sbyin de dag lhags te bka' ci stsal zhes smra ba'i bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-2: de phyin cad bka' thams cad byed pa'i g-yog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-3: de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ma'i gnas su song nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-4: khro mo'i snying gar rdog pas mnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas na tshes nyi shu dgu la 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-5: de nas dbang du gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g-yog mor 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-6: phrag pa la khyer nas mtho ris su khrid de slar yang khrid cing 'ongs nas tshogs kyi bdag por bcu gcing de dag gis mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-7: sngon ma byung ba'i don thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-10: 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang ster te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-11: rnal 'byor gang gi khro bo'i 'jig rten du yang 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-12: de la sus kyang cung zad kyang byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-13: de nas dpal chen mo bsgrub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku las lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-14: de las ma 'gul cig ces bsgo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-15: de phyin cad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:28b-16: sangs rgyas pa yang ster ba'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-1: mtsho dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-2: [?] des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi ge'i phreng bar byas la phreng ba'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin pa'i bar du bklags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-3: nyin re zhing dus gsum du las de byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-4: de nas brgyad stong bzlas na zla ba gcig lon pa dang mtsho dbyangs ma mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-5: de phyin chad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-8: shes nyen can du bya ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-9: bzo thams cad kyang ma bslabs par des rab tu shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-10: de nas lig bu mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-13: ba bla rnams la bsgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-15: 'jom pa'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan ste grub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-16: gcig gis ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-17: gnyis pas ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-18: gsum pas ni nam gnas gong mar 'dzeg pa na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-19: gur gum la sogs pa bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-20: 'jom pa'i bu gar bcug la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan nas nam 'bar gyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-21: de nas thig le byas nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29a-24: tshe lo stong du thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-0: de nas @29b s'a la bhanytsi ka sgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-1: gnas gang na s'a la bhanytse ka ri mo bris pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-2: gzugs su byas pa de'i 'jom pa la sor mo bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-3: zla ba gcig gi bar du zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-4: de nas zla ba gcig gi mthar mtshan thog thag zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-5: de nas nang bar rang gi gzugs su bstan nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-6: gnod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod pas gnod sbyin mo gang na 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la rang gi gzugs su 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas na de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'i bran mor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-7: de nas sha za mo bsgrub par 'dod pas phyag dar phung po mes btang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-8: lag pa g-yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung la g-yas pas zegs ma bsregs pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las ci tsam du sha za mo gdong mdangs gzugs mi sdug pa 'ongs te rang gi gzugs su gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-9: de yang de bzhin du bran mor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-10: de nas ci bgyi bsgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-11: tshes nyi shu dgu la brgyad stong bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-12: de nas zla ba gcig slong mo la za zhing grangs med par bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-13: zla ba gcig lon pa dang nub gsum smyung ba byas nas mtshan thog thag zlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-14: de nas nang par ci bgyi 'ongs na des mi 'jigs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-15: de nas de rang nas 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-16: de phyin cad 'dod pa thams cad 'bul ba'i g-yog tu 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:29b-17: mtho ris kyi lha mo'ang 'gugs shing 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-4: da ltar gyi thams cad kyang smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-5: gzhan gyi nor thams cad kyang phrog nas 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-6: de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar 'dod pa dngos grub med pa gang yin pa des zla ba drug gi bar du nyin zhag bcu bcu zhing spyad pa snga ma brjes la slong mo'i kha zas la sogs pa nas rlung bza' ba'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-7: de nas mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par sangs rgyas pa yang sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-8: de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi spyad pa rnams byas la de'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni h'um zhes thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-9: de nas rol langs bsgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-10: ma smras ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs la legs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-11: me tog gi phreng ba btags nas rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la dbugs byung gi bar du bzlas na de ldang ste langs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-12: de zhon na thams cad du 'gro zhing tshe yang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-13: de nas ro langs kyi grub pa mchog sgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30a-14: ma smas ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs nas de bzhin du rab tu brgyan la zhon te langs shing yang 'gyel ba'i bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-0: de phrag pa la khyer na de bzhin gshegs @30b pa thams cad srel ba'i rig 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-1: tshe yang bskal bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-2: de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyis las su 'gyur pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-4: thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-8: rgyal po la sogs pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-9: mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa ni brtan par lta bas mtshams bcad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi 'da' na gzhan lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-12: phyogs bcing ba yang lta ba des so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-13: dbab pa ni reg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-14: ma reg pas ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-23: rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya gos kyis g-yogs la bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-24: gu gul gyi bdag pas dbab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-25: gdon zhi bar bya ba ni h'um zhes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-26: rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'phungs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-27: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byad ma'i gdon las thar par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-28: he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan pas ni byad mas bsad pa las slar gso bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-29: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzung bas skra las bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:30b-30: bslang bas ni dug gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-2: dug zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-4: dug gzhig par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-5: dug gis shi ba las gso bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-6: rdo rje h'um zhes pa gcig gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-7: gter dbyung ba ni zangs kyi ril ba chus bkang la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-8: rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-9: gu gul gyis bdug pa byas te bzlas na gal te gter yod na ni chu de lud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-10: de ste med na ni 'khyil lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-11: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i h'um zhes pa bzlas te blang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-12: snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing gis ma bus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-15: mar gyis r'a dza ko sh'a ta ka'i me tog la bskus nas stong phrag brgyad bsregs na snang ba thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-16: 'og gi gnas su ni rdo rje 'og gi phyag rgyas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas rdo rje h'um zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtse bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-17: gtogs 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci yang byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-18: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-27: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la lo gcig gi bar du dus gsum du brgya brgyar bzlas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-28: de nas lo gcig lon na brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31a-29: de snyed du brgyar bzlas na de snyed kyi brgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-0: de nas @31b stong du bzlas na yang stong du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-1: longs spyod dgug pa ni stong phrag brgyar bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-2: dgug pa ni rdo rje kyo btang gi phyag rgyas zla ba bzhis khugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-3: dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-4: sems can thams cad gtan 'pho ba ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-5: sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-6: chu gnon pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la chu'i steng du 'gror rung ba'i bar du bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-7: me gnon pa ni thang cig bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-8: lo tog bsrung ba ni rdo rje lta bas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-9: de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-10: byi ba la sogs pa yang 'da' bar mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-11: rdeg pa spong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te gang du bltas pa der 'pho'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-13: btung ba thams cad spo ba ni 'bar ba'i lta bas ni rang gi snod du 'pho'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-15: sbrul thams cad med par bya ba ni thang cig brjod pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-16: gcan srin thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-17: rkun po thams cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-18: dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-22: rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:31b-23: de thogs na dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-0: zhal che la ni thang gcig brjod pas rtsod pa'i lan thebs par @32a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-2: zhi ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-3: rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-4: gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tsher ma'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-5: gso ba thams cad ni nga'ur [?] ba'i lo ma'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-8: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba ni til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-10: gzhom pa thams cad ni h'um zhes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-12: myos par bya ba thams cad la phags ces bya bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-13: thams cad gnyid log tu gzhug pa ni bskums la mig btsums te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-14: brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par byas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-15: sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas bltas na rgyas btab par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-16: nyin bdun las lhag par mi gson no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-17: ngag 'phrog ba ni rang gi lce sos bzung nas h'um zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyor ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-18: snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mo'i phyag rgyas dpung ba bsnol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-19: rang gi mchan khung du glong zhing snying po bzlas na nub bdun tshun chad 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-20: snying bcad pa ni rdo rje blangs te gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-21: snying dbye ba ni rdo rje lcags phur gyis gdab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32a-22: ming nas smos shing gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-0: snying spo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje blangs te mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'pho bar 'gyur @32b ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-1: de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar bar bya ba bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-2: des rgyas 'debs pa la ni khu tshur dam pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-3: ngag 'phrog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gis bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-4: snying 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya snying gar dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-5: bcad pa la ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa bzlas nas 'o mas khrus shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-6: phye ba la ni phur bu phyung nas rdo rje dris skus shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-7: snying spo ba la ni rdo rje snying pos thar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-8: de bzhin du byad ma'i phyag rgya yang spo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-9: snying bsgrub par 'dod na bud med kyi snying gar lta zhing lan gcig bzlas na de'i snying ga nas sgra thos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-10: skyes pa'i snying gar yang de bzhin du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-11: snying ga thams cad du yang de ltar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-12: de nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsgrub par 'dod pas ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa brgyar bzlas na pha rol gyi sems shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-13: sngon gyi gnas shes phar bya ba ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-14: rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing bdug pas ka pi tsas bdugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-15: gnyid log na de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-17: da ltar gyi shes pa ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:32b-18: tshig bsgrub par 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gi stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur te ci bslangs pa de stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-0: cho 'phrul ston pa ni bzlas pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gis @33a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-1: brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lus la cho 'phrul du 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-6: gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-7: rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar byed 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rje bzlas pa stong phrag brgya bzlas na gzugs gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-9: bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su'ang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-10: mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la rdo rje bzung bas mi snang bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-12: khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-13: nam 'phar gyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-14: gdon gyis 'dzin du gzhug na rdo rje h'um zhes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-15: gdon gar byed du 'jug pa ni hi zhes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-16: gdon bskyod pa ni hag ces pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-17: gdon gzhom pa ni phags ces pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-18: gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i skra'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa bcings na gcer bar 'gyur te gos brje bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-19: sdang bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dral bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-20: bskrad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33a-21: dgos pa bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sha chen po rang gi khrag gis bskus te sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-0: gzhan gyi bud med dgug pa ni @33b rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-1: yang na thams cad du khyab pa h'um zhes pas thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-2: bud med thams cad dang dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje bcings pas bzung la nyin bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-3: de nas mjug tu nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na rtag tu ldang la mi snyoms shing bcud mang la rtags shugs drag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-4: bu mo spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab par h'um zhes bya ba byas nas spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-5: bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-6: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-7: sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-8: snang ba la dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje blangs te rang gi spyi bor bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-9: de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-10: nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso bo'i phye mas sbyin sreg byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-11: char dbab pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa stong bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:33b-12: char gcad pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-0: @34a *// ser ba gcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-1: gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-2: sprin dgag pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa brgyar bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-3: bsal bal ni rdo rje h'um zhes pa lan brgyar bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-4: rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-6: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la rdo rje langs kyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-7: de thogs nas sa bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du sgyu ma'i las rnams ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-8: rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-10: nam mkha' la me tog gi phreng ba chags par bya ba ni dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na chags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-11: cha lugs bzhad par bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-12: gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-13: smra bar bya ba na h'um zhes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-14: rgyug par bya na rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-15: smin ma 'gul bar bya na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smin mtshams su bsgul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-16: sa g-yo bar bya na rkang pa g-yon pa brdabs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-17: khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-18: khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo btang gi phyag rgya bcings pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34a-19: sprin med par char pa dbab pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-0: skad cig tu sprin 'du @34b zhing ston pa ni rdo rje bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-2: nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni rdo rje brdabs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-4: zla ba mang por bstan na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-5: rdo rje bzhi nam mkha' la gtor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-6: dmag rnam bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-7: mtshan mo nyin par du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-8: nyin par mtshan mor bya na mig btsums la rdo rje bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-9: thams cad nas rdo rje bstan na brgya bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-10: thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' bstan na stong bzlas te rdo rjes bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-11: phyag na rdo rje thams cad ba la bstan na stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-12: thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la bye ba bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-13: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-14: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-16: ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:34b-17: de nas phyag na rdo rjes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog por 'dug @35a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-3: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-4: sems can thams cad kyang rab tu g-yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing dbang du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-5: de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-6: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-7: de'i dbus su nas phul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-8: de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang tsog tsog por bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-9: de nas de bzhin du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-11: khyod deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-12: de ste dad na de bshad do zhes bsgos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-15: de nas khyod deng phan cad de bzhin gshegs par gyur to zhes smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-18: dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes des smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-19: gang dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-20: des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35a-21: pha rol la thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i @35b dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-1: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-2: dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-3: rdo rje'i sgrub pa bsgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-4: lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje bzung nas rang gi phyag rgya bsgom so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-5: rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-7: rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs pa yang tshe di'am gzhan la thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-9: thams cad dam tshig chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-10: dad brtan phyag na rdo rje la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-11: de bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-12: sems can thams cad mgu ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-13: khyod kyi de ltar brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-14: deng nas khyod kyi de ltar ma byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-15: sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-17: yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la slob ma bcug nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-18: lus thams cad kyis gtugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-20: de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad ni bshags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-21: de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-22: pus mo gnyis sa la gtugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-23: bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:35b-24: de nas langs te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-0: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings @36a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gi badzra bid brjod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-3: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-4: phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-9: de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa bsgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-10: dkyil 'khor mthong bas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i g-yas su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-11: g-yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-12: de nas gso sbyong can du dus gsum du khrus byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-13: dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-15: de'i mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-17: sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-18: de nas yang cho ga bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-19: ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-20: de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36a-22: bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs su phyag na rdo @36b rje ya gcig gis rdo rje gsor g-yon pa na padma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-2: khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-3: de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba tshang nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-4: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-6: yang cho ga gzhan ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas pas 'jug la nyin mtshan gsum du smyung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-7: phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-9: nam mkha' la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-10: des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin gcig bzhin stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-11: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-12: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lag nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:36b-14: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-0: @37a *// rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-4: bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g-yo ba yang bskyod cing 'dren na sems can gzhan lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-5: gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jig pa thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-6: gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-7: thams cad la srung par 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-8: phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-10: don thams cad sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-11: dgos pa thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-12: gang bslabs pa tsam gyis grub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-0: khyod @37b kyis legs par smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-2: de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-3: rang gi snying gar bstong pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-5: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bskyod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-11: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying por gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa yang sra bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-16: mi bgrungs pa'i phyogs thams cad kyang brlag par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-17: gdon thams cad bcos bsad bcom ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-18: 'dar bad pad nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-22: bdag cag skyobs shig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-24: phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabs su dengs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-25: 'di nyid khyed la skyob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:37b-26: phyag na rdo rje'i snying gnas kun tu 'bar bas bskor bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba @38a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-1: la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'dzum zhing khro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-2: phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-3: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje h'um zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs na phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bka' nod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-5: nga ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-8: de bas na khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-10: bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38a-11: gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par 'gyur ba de smros shig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38b-25: gnyis kyis me tog gzhu 'gengs shing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:38b-28: rdo rje dga' ba bri bar bya //
