K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:39a-5: ston ka'i rdo rje kha ba mo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:41b-24: dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa yang stsol to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:41b-27: mi bde ba ma spangs par myur du shi zhing du 'bod chen por skye bar 'gyur ta te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42a-10: de nas de bzhin du 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42a-11: shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42a-12: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-0: de @42b phyin chad 'gro ba gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-1: de nas phyag na rdo rje'i las 'byung ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-4: rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying gar bcings la phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid du bzlas so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-10: shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-11: ci 'dod ci nus kyis bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mthong gi bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-13: de nas sa bcu po 'thob ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-14: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-16: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-17: dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-18: slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-19: mi zad snying po 'di mi sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-20: dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phyag brgya bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:42b-21: de nas ras la bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-1: kyi dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-2: de'i g-yas su phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi ba'i thugs ka nas thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-3: g-yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-4: gnyis na ni padmo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-5: gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-7: spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-8: steng du nam mkha'i snying bo bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-9: grvar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas 'gram pa dang mgo bor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-10: de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhin dus bzhir stong bzlas shing bsgrubs na de nas zla ba tshang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-12: ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-14: lha mo yang de bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-15: de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-16: de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-17: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-18: mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang bar rdo rje 'dzin 'thob po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-19: ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-20: de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa ni mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43a-21: de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-0: mtshan mo yang thal @43b byung du bzlas na nang bar phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-1: 'dod pa'i longs spyod chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-3: yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-4: ras la bcom ldan 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-5: de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-6: stong phrag brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-7: bsgo ba bzhin du las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyed zhing slar yang khyer te 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyer te 'ongs nas de la sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-10: des kyang longs spyod par nus na lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-12: phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-13: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-14: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-15: de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-16: de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag gis grub par 'tshal gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-19: ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:43b-20: grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-0: @44a *// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-1: nam mkha'i snying bo'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-2: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-3: rdo rje bzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na de nas las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-4: phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-5: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mthong zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa yang stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-6: rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung btsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-8: 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-9: kyo btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-10: kyo btang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-11: zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhags pa des thams cad drang nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-12: lag pa gnyis rdo rjes bcings pa bsdams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-13: 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44a-14: rdo rje dbang pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-0: 'gro ba thams cad dbang @44b nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-1: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na h'um zhes bya ba gcig gi gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-2: 'gro ba thams cad skad cig gis ltung bar byed nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-3: lha chen po rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-4: zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-5: mthu bo che rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-6: 'khor lo de thogs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-7: tshangs pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-8: brgya byin rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje sbyin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-9: rdo rje bskor bas tshar bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-11: thang cig gis ni gnam lcags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-13: sa nad gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-14: gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-15: las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-16: nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi rna cha sbyin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-17: des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-18: zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na zla ba gnyis su mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:44b-19: de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdangs su 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-0: sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing sems @45a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-1: can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-2: gza' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-3: pe con des ni 'thabs na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-4: skya sleng gi gnas su song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-5: 'bum bzlas na skya sleng las kun byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-6: rgyun gyis myos pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshed [?] gi snod thams cad nam 'tsho'i bar du mi zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-7: ma dh'u ka ra la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-8: rgyal ba la bltas te 'bum bzlas na 'thab mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-9: rtsod pa'i g-yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-10: rgyal ba thob pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-11: mdzod skyong rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-12: btung ba mi zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang 'di la zad par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-14: rlung mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na rlung gis de dang mthun par 'dod pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-15: me la bltas te 'bum bzlas na me'i dbus su 'dug ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45a-17: 'gro na yang mi 'tshig ste me'i gzir gyur cing nyin gcig kyang gser srang re re sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-0: ngal gsos po mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin thams @45b cad kyi bdag por gyur nas nor thams cad kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-1: phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa la 'dug pa'i gter 'byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-2: gshin rje mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-3: gnam 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na de las thams cad pa'i g-yog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-4: klu ba ru na mnan te 'bum bzlas na klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g-yog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-5: mi'i gnas su song nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na mi thams cad g-yog byed cing don thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-6: sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-7: nam mkha' la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad bsgyel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-8: dbang byed par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-9: sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa'i 'og na 'khod pa kun la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-10: rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-11: gser gyi dong tse la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-12: skyes pa bzung ste 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:45b-13: bud med bzung ste stong phrag brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-0: rta la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du @46a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-2: glang po che la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-3: ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rva gnyis bzung te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-5: rgyan gyi chas la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-6: dpal mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-7: mtsho dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-8: de nas bslangs na ci bslangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-10: rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-11: grub byed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas na 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-13: ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bslangs bar nor sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-14: s'a la bha nytsa tsi ka mnan nas 'bum bzlas na nyin re bzhin yang gser gyi dong tse brgyad brgyad ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-15: gos gyi sgrogs la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-17: gang gi snod mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-19: gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-20: ci 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46a-21: srin po mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g-yog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-0: @46b 'byung po mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-1: sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g-yog byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-2: de bzhin du gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa yang bsgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-3: ri la 'jegs te 'bum bzlas na ri thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-4: phyugs kyi lhas su 'dug te 'bum bzlas na phyugs thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-5: shing ljon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas na shing ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-6: zhing la 'dug te 'bum bzlas na bza' ba 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-7: tshong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad ma bslangs par thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-8: zhing la 'dug te 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-9: grong du 'bum bzlas na zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis grong de thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-10: gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-11: lha'i rten du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-12: khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de'i g-yog tu 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-13: dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:46b-14: snang ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas na snang ba dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-0: skyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas na skyed mos tshal @47a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-2: 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-3: mtshor 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-4: gter gyi gnas su 'bum bzlas na gter rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-5: dgod cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-6: bgad ba tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-7: khros pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-8: cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-9: lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyi 'bum bzlas na tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-10: bud med kyi 'jom par rtags btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-11: 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-12: 'jom pa la mdzub mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-13: 'gro ba thams cad 'dren cing 'gugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-17: 'jom pa lta zhing 'bum bzlas na bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-18: 'jom par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47a-19: 'jom par gur gum bskus te 'bum bzlas na des bskus pas 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-0: 'jom par ba [?] bla bcug ste 'bum @47b bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-1: 'jom par ldong ros bcug ste 'bum bzlas na rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-2: ral gri thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-3: 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-4: kyo btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo btang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-5: rdo rje gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-6: phyag na rdo rje lag gi bzung nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-8: sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing 'bum bzlas na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-9: phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyi lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs las bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:47b-11: rdo rje snying po bzung nas 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-0: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bsdams pa tsam gyis las kun byed nus par @48a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nu la lta zhing 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la yi ge snang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-4: spobs pa thogs pa med par thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-5: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor zhing 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-6: nam mkha'i mdzod la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la rgyu ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-9: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi bar du ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-10: byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-11: dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-12: yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-13: dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-14: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-15: rdo rje'i bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48a-16: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-1: las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-6: mi zad mi nyams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-7: 'dod pa thams cad nyams su myong zhing bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-8: yid bde ba thams cad rnyed cing 'thob ste sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-9: bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-12: grogs thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-13: de dag la yang 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-14: bsam pa tsam gyis sgyu ma thams cad ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos 'phrul yang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-18: skad cig gis gzugs sna tshogs su ston par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-23: shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-24: dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing don gyis 'bum bzlas na des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:48b-25: h'um zhes pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-2: spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-3: sems can thams cad grub pa gsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-4: de ltar mi zad mi nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-5: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-6: phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-9: bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-10: gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49a-18: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyis smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-0: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems @49b dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-2: de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-3: ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-4: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-5: de nas yang dag par bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-6: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-7: 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-8: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-9: de dbus srad bu mnyam pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-10: grva bzhi par ni gdab pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-11: gnyis pa'i grva ni sgong bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-12: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-13: dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-14: dbus su thig ni bzhi yang bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-15: tshon rtsi dmar po dag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-17: de yi snying po dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-18: 'jig rten mgon po gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-19: 'dab ma kun gyi steng rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-20: sangs rgyas cha lugs bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-21: padma che mchog phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:49b-22: der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-2: nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-4: 'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-5: 'di lan cig brjod nas bsgom ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-6: de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo btang gis kun drangs la padmo chen po de spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-7: de la padmo chen po'i kyo btang ni 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-8: aom mah'a padma h'um dza hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po nyid byon te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-10: slob dpon la zhal ston par mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-11: de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyi slob ma gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-12: dkar pos g-yogs la gos dkar po bgos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-13: thod dkar pos mgo la gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-14: tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-15: de nas lag pa g-yon par padmo byin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-16: g-yas par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad padmo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-18: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-19: rtag par ru ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-20: khyod ni deng nas spyan ras gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-21: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-22: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po padmo zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-1: padmo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-2: dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la padma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyi blta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-4: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-5: dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus su padmo stong bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-6: de nas padmo re re zhing bzang po thang res bcom ldan 'das la padmo stong 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-7: de nas slob ma bcug ste dam tshig brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-8: slob min bu min ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-9: dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-11: dag pa nyid de padma bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-13: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-15: phyag na rdo rje'i tshig gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-16: lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-17: nam mkha'i snying po las kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos sgrub pa'i cho ga 'ji gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:50b-20: ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-0: rang gi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs shing de bzhin @51a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-1: gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs par bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-2: de nas zla ba yar gyi tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun tu bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-3: nam spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i padmo'i dbus su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-4: yang de las gzhan pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i gnas su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-5: de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur kun gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-6: skad cig gcig gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing ldog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-7: sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-8: tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-10: 'bum bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-11: nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-12: sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-13: de nas dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-15: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51a-16: bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-0: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na de'i nang par de @51b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying gar zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-2: yang na khar zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-3: de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas bdag srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-4: gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-7: gsum pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-8: dbab pa ni tsandan na gyi bdug pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-9: gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hr'i zhes bya bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-10: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje me tog bzlas te byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-11: sems can thams cad gnon pas ni sa ser pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-12: bud med dbang du bya ba ni su ma n'a'i me tog la bsngags pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-13: chom rkun gnon pa ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-15: bya gnon pa ni yungs kar gtor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-16: sgyu ma gnon pa ni rma bya'i char bus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-17: rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-18: rmi lam ngan pa gzhil pa ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-19: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim bya'i sgro'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-20: bu mo thor bu dbang du bya ba ni bu mo'i skra'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-21: yugs sa mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:51b-22: bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-0: @52a *// 'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po la mchod pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-1: nub gsum rangs par bzlas na de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-2: spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-4: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-5: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-6: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-9: bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po 'bul gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52a-11: 'dis sems can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-0: de nas bcom ldan @52b 'das kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la skyes bu chen po smros shig ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-1: de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-2: tram p'a b'a ta ta ha ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-3: de nas 'di brjod pas nam mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-6: nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-8: de nas nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-9: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-10: rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-11: grva brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-12: rin chen kun dang ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-13: der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-14: re ba thams cad grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-15: nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-16: grub cig grub cig sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-17: bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:52b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-0: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bzhag la @53a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-1: de'i thad 'khor kun tu phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-2: de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-3: bcug nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-4: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-5: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-6: don shes bstan pa gang yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-7: byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-8: de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-9: de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-13: de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-14: nor sbyin [?] pa ni sems can thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-15: zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-16: chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi snang ba thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-17: de nas snying po byin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-18: rin po che thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-19: aom badzra ratn'a bhi shi k'a bhi shinytsa sarba dhi pa ti h'um b'a b'a ta ta ha ha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-20: de nas rdo rje nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bslab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-23: de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te sngags ni 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-24: aom b'a b'a ta mu bam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-25: de nas mchod pa rnam bzhi bya ste 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-26: dbang thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53a-27: de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-0: rdo rje rin po che dbus su bris la @53b lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che langs kyi bar du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-2: dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-4: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-5: nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-9: nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la de nas de btsud de thams cad bstan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-11: sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-12: gal te nyin re mchod stongs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-13: khyod kyis nor dang don bsags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-15: de la 'di ni mna'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-16: aom b'a b'a ta ta ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-17: de nas chus dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-19: las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-20: de'i dbus su bzhag nas der btsud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-21: de nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-23: dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-24: de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-25: bram ze la sogs pa la ci nus kyis sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-26: de nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams la sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:53b-27: de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyod khrid thams cad la sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-0: de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang @54a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-1: ba'i sems can rnams la sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-4: ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-5: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang skur ba bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-6: de'i g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-7: g-yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-8: de nas ras la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i bjug tu yi ma shar ba nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-9: phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i sngo ras la bris pa de las byug nas sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-10: dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-11: de nas ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-12: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54a-13: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-0: nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal @54b srid 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-1: rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gser gyi dong tse 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-3: 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-5: des nor yang skye bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-6: rdo rje 'khor lo srin lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-7: nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas nam mkha' las nor thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-8: zas thams cad kyi yo byad zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-9: byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnam gyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-10: de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-11: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-12: nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-13: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:54b-15: bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-0: bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa @55a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-2: des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo rnyed kyi sems can rnams 'grub pa thams cad grub par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-3: de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-7: rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-8: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g-yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-9: aom ru tu ru tu h'um ma ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-10: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-12: 'khor thams cad dang bcas nas ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-14: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-15: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55a-16: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-1: rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-2: de yi dbus su sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-3: rdo rje'i khu tshur gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-4: rdo rje'i khu tshur rdo rjer bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-5: lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-6: de yi ngos ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-7: sangs rgyas gzugs rnams gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-8: de dag gi ni grva kun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-10: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-12: h'um dakshi ni sma ra na phags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-14: de la phyag rgya yang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-15: de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying gar dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-17: de nas slob ma gzhug pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-18: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-19: de bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-21: deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-22: rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:55b-27: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs blangs nas phreng ba de'i @56a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-2: dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying gar dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-3: de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g-yon par rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-4: g-yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-5: de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-6: zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-7: de ste rdo rje'o zhes zer na de'i lag pa g-yon par rdo rje byin la 'di skad bsgo zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-8: 'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-9: de nas gdong g-yogs pa dkrol la dkyil 'khor ston la 'di zhes smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-11: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-12: bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-13: bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-14: de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcings pa slobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-15: dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-16: de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-17: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-18: dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-19: de yi dbus su ci rigs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-20: sangs rgyas sku lugs gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-21: thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-22: rdo rje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-23: de yi ngos ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-24: phyag rgya bzhin ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-25: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56a-26: rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-0: de bzhin rdo rje padmo'i @56b dbus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-1: rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-2: grva yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-3: mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-4: de nas btsud nas phyag rgya kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-5: bcing ba yang ni bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-6: sgrub pa gsang ba dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-7: bskur ba gsang ba bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-8: 'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-9: sgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-11: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-12: de bzhin du mtshan ma gzhag nas 'di zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-13: ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-14: phyag rgya shes par bstan na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-15: rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-16: sna tshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-18: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-19: dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-20: de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-21: rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-22: sor mo thams cad dgug bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-23: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-24: rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-25: de nas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-26: de lta bur mi ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pas ni dam tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:56b-27: thams cad kyi ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-2: 'o ma 'thung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-3: de nas ras la bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-4: ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyis bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcing par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-9: de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag bdun smyungs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsgoms la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-10: mtshan thal byung du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-11: de nas nam phyed nas bdud kyi las sna tshogs snang par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57a-13: aom bdzra mushati ha na ha na sarba m'a ra na phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-0: de nas nang phar gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus @57b kun tu 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-2: yang ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-3: ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-4: de'i g-yas phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-7: rdo rje khu tshur gyis phyag rgya g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-8: g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-9: de'i g-yas su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu tshur can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gzhon nu ma dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje dam du 'tshir ba mdog dam yor [?] bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-10: de'i thad du rdo rje'i gsal phur ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-12: lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsal phur thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor tshugs kyi dbu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-14: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-16: mchog sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-17: de'i g-yon du padmo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-18: de'i g-yon du rdo rje'i dpal mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-20: rdo rje dpal mo ni gser gyi sku mdog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:57b-21: dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-0: rdo rje pho nya mo ni mdog @58a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-1: sngon mo la rdo rje 'bar ba 'chang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-2: de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-4: gzugs kyi ras de las phat ces bya ba thos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-6: de phyin chad nam mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod na mi snang bar yang 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-7: dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro bzhing gyen du yang 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-9: kun tu 'khyil bas 'khyil ba'i skra can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus su gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-10: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-11: chad pas bcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-12: gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas shing rga ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-14: yang cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-15: de'i g-yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-16: sku mdog autpal sngon po'i kha dog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58a-17: phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyang la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-0: de'i g-yon phyogs su bcom ldan @58b 'das ma dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yid tsam dud pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-1: lag pa g-yas pa na aa mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-2: g-yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-3: de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum smyungs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-4: gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ska'i 'bru mar la snyugs pa brgyad stong du pa med pa'i 'dag me la bsreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-5: de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog stsol ba ni rgyal po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-8: lha ma yin pa dbang ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-14: yang bsgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-15: ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-16: de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa autpal sngon po'i mdog spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:58b-17: stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung bzlas na nam phyed nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byon to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-0: @59a *// rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang aa mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-1: de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-2: de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-3: rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-4: khu tshur bcings pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-5: lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings na phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'bum pa zlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-6: lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcing te stong phrag brgya bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-7: khu tshur bcings pa des mi snang bar 'gyur te phral na snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-8: rdo rje bcings pa'i khu tshur byas la 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-10: gnyid log par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59a-11: nam mkha' la rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-6: sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-7: 'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-8: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-9: 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-12: khu tshur bsgyur bas thams cad gtan 'pho nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-13: g-yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas thams cad las nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-19: 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-24: reg bya las dam pa thams cad kyang dgug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-25: bud med kyi nu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-34: gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyang dgug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-36: nyin zhag gcig smyungs la lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-37: stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin chad khu tshur bcangs pas las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:59b-38: de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-14: sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-16: sa la sogs pa g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-17: thams cad la dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-21: sngon ma byung ba'i sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-22: so sor lung ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-24: sgo thams cad dbye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-26: dug thams cad bslang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-27: ma rungs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-29: thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-38: thams cad slar bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-39: sngon chad med pa'i gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60a-49: gzugs mang po ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-0: nam @60b mkha' la 'gro ba bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-1: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-2: rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-5: bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-6: gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-9: khyod kyis smros shig ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-10: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-12: de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las yi ge mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-14: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:60b-16: de'i dbus kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-2: de'i thad 'khor thams cad du yi ge aa ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-3: de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-4: ni shtha panydza ga zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yang stsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-6: de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' la yi ger bris te thams cad gsung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-7: de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-9: deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-10: snying po 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-11: de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-12: aa ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-15: aa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-16: ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-17: pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-18: tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-19: na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-24: rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61a-26: de bas na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-0: rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob @61b par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-1: de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-2: spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-3: de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-4: de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbus su ral gri bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-5: mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-6: des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-7: rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-8: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po tshul bzhin du bris la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-9: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-10: a'a d+ya nu tpa nna tva ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-11: aa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes nang par langs nas nyin re lan re brjod na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi gos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-13: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-19: de nas bsgrub par 'dod pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la bris nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:61b-20: yi ge phreng ba thams cad brjod de 'di skad du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi bsgrub pa'o zhes kyang brjod nas yi ge 'di 'bum bzlas na spobs pa mi zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-1: de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni lan gcig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-2: gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-3: gsum bzlas pas ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-4: bzhi bzlas pas dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-5: lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-6: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yi ge phreng ba g-yas phyogs nas aa zhes bya ba'i drung du na zhes bya ba phyin gyi bar du bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-7: de nas bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-8: yi ge re re 'bum rdzogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-10: phyag na rdo rje cig char 'grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-11: nyin re zhing mthong bar bstan nas chos bshad de slar gshegs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-12: tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-13: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-0: bdag gis kyang @62b 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po 'di stsal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-1: gang brjod pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpa' la bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-3: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi snying po phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-5: de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-6: sems can thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-7: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-8: rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-9: rdo rje 'khor lo bdag che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-10: rang gi lag na phyag rgya thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-11: de yi dbus su gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-12: de yi thad 'khor thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-13: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lo tshogs rnams bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-14: de yang sems can chen po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-15: de dag nyid ni legs par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-16: de nas blo ldan thog ma ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-18: zhugs nas snying po 'di bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-20: zhes brjod na des bcom ldan 'das dgyes te grub pa thams cad du stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-21: de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:62b-22: rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-3: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-4: rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-5: de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-7: dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-10: mthong dang de bzhin bsgrubs na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-12: de bas brtags te bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-14: dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-15: phyag rgya shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-16: brtson 'grus brtan pas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-17: bla med pas ni bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-19: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-20: ji ltar dga' ba'i cho ga 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-21: rtog pa las bshad pa sgrubs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-22: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63a-26: bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-0: snying @63b po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis smros shig ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-2: de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-3: aom ga gan sam bha ba bdzra p'a tsa ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-4: de nas de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la nam mkha' las mchod pa kun 'byung bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-6: rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-7: de yi dbus su nor chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-8: nam mkha' dang por bzhugs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-9: rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-10: dang por slob dpon 'jug pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-11: mchod pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-12: dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-13: rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-15: de bzhin du slob ma yang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la phyag rgya yang slobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-16: mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-17: de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-18: yid kyi dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:63b-20: 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de bden pa gang gis nam mkha' gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-0: yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams @64a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-1: cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas nas 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-2: rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na de nas nam mkha' las mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-4: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-6: dkyil 'khor bris nas btsud de 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig go zhes brjod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-7: 'byung ba kun las nam mkha' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-10: 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-12: 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cig ces bsgo zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-14: slob ma nam mkha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-15: der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa yang slobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-17: nam mkha'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do zhes nyin re zhing byas na 'grub po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-18: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64a-19: nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'o;; ;;de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-0: bdag gis @64b kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsol bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-1: gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smres shig ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-4: aom me tri dri dha tsi te tishtha ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-5: de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-7: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der byams pa bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-9: byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-10: cho ga brtan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-12: de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-13: btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag rgya bslab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-14: de nas go chas bskon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-15: brtan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-16: de nas byams pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:64b-17: byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrubs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-2: rangs sam yang na khros kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-3: mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-5: byams pa chen po bsgom par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-7: de nas dkyil 'khor du btsud la 'di bslab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-9: sems can thams cad dge bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-10: 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-11: byol song thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-13: byams pa bsgoms pas grub pa thams cad ci 'dod pa'i sgrub pas bsgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-14: las rnams kyang yid kyi ci 'dod pa'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-16: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rje rig pa'i dam pa la sogs pas mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-19: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-21: aom bhi nda bdzra sh'u la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-22: aom tstshi na dha h'um tsakra phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-23: aom bhu ra bhu ba sva: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-24: aom ha na bhinda bdzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-25: aom la la la la aa bi sha gha nta tan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65a-26: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-0: dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dkyil 'khor @65b gyi grva'i srad bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-1: der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad bri ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-3: mthar ni tshon gyi thig le yang gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-4: de nas thog mar slob dpon gyis gsal phur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'dug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-5: g-yon logs nas rdo rje'i slob ma yang bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-6: de nas phyag rgya yang bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-7: de phyin chad thams cad 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-8: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-9: rig pa'i blon po chen po'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-10: de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba; aom aa mri ta ku nda li kha kha kha kha krodha dzva l'a m'a la h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-11: aom mah'a pr'a ba hpho ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-12: aom k'a la danda ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-13: aom k'a la pra sh'a gra a'a kaddha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-14: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-15: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris la de yi dbus su rdo rje gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-16: phyogs bzhir ni khro bo rnams de bzhin du bar chad du byas la 'god do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-17: de nas slob dpon bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgyar zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:65b-18: de nas thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-2: rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-3: de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa tshogs kyi gtso bos snying po 'di rnams phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-4: aom mah'a b'a l'a ka mah'a ga na de bi ba bi pa ru hr'i: ran sarba dusht'a na n'a phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-5: aom m'a l'a dha ra tsa la tsa la ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-6: aom dha nur dha ra ba sh'i ku ru sarba sad tv'an sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-7: aom dza ya bi dza ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-9: gzhu lta bur dkyil 'khor bris la der rdo rje gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-10: g-yas su 'ang gnyis g-yon du'ang gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-11: de nas rdo rje srin bu'i phyag rgyas btsud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-12: de nas phyag rgya bslabs nas cho ga bslab pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-13: gang dge ba dang drin gzo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-14: lha yi 'khor mthong ma gtogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-15: gzhan rnams de dag thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-16: mi dge ba rnams gtan 'phor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-17: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-18: tshogs kyi gtso bo'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-19: de nas rdo rje gtun shing la sogs pa'i pho nyas rang gi snying po smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-22: aom badzra dzv'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-23: aom bi ka ta bhee ra ba de hi me sa ra bandha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66a-24: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni shing rta dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-0: dbus su rdo rje gzhag nas rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgyas bcug @66b la las 'di bslab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-1: mi dge ba'i sems can thams cad 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-5: de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-6: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-7: pho nya'i tshogs kyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje kyo btang la sogs pa bran rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-10: bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-11: aom b'a ra ha damshta tka ta bi ga to dha ra sarba na kha na kha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-12: aom sarba m'a ra da da h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-13: aom bi ka te ka damshtra bhindha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-14: aom mah'a ma ni ha ra ha ra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-15: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-16: gru gsum par bris la mngon sum pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-17: gar gyi mchod pas ni dbus kyi rdo rje la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-18: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-20: de nas ma thams cad kyis ku co'i sgra bton te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-21: gar gyi mchod pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas rang rang gi snying po phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-22: de nas rdo rje'i blon mo chen mo dag gis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:66b-23: aom badzra kro dha ra li h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-0: aom badzra tsa kra tshin dha h'um @67a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-3: aom badzra mushti ha na shin dha ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-4: aom ku m'a ra ha bi sha gha na ti ke ra na ra na ca l'a ya sarba du sht'a na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-5: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i sgor 'khor la sogs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-6: de'i dbus su rdo rje khro mo'i me lag nas rdo rje'i gsal bur can bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-7: dam tshig gi cho ga ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-8: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-9: rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-10: de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rang gi snying po smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-11: aom aa mri te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-12: aom soo mya kro dhe h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-13: aom danda ta dha ri na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-14: aom bim ga li h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-15: dkyil 'khor zur brgyad pa bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-16: de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-17: cha bzhir bgos pa rnams la bzhi po rim gyis bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-18: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-20: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-21: rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-22: de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-23: aom kharga ma ri ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-24: aom aa sha si ba dhe hi ra ma ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-25: aom p'a sha sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-26: aom sarba r'a ma ni ra ti bri ye ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67a-27: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni zlum po te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67b-0: dbus su se ral srad bu byas @67b te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67b-1: thig bzhi btab la rim pa bzhir bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-002:67b-2: gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du zlum por thig bzhi rim du btab la /
